title: japatha japatha hari nAma
sahitya:
japata japata harinAma manuja japata

caraNam 1

aparimitAMhOharamanapAyam
AgamasAdhitamamrtOpAyam 

caraNam 2

patitAnAmapi pAvanamantram
shitikaNThAnisha jIvana tantram

caraNam 3

kiM bahu tapasA kiM bahu yAgaiH
kiM bahu tapasA kiM bahu yOgaiH 

caraNam 4

bhaktiyutA vA bhayataraLA vA
muktiparA vA bhuktiparA vA

caraNam 5

snAnE pAnE shayanE gamanE
dAnE gAnE dhaRmmavidhAnE

caraNam 6

Apadi sampadi cAkhilasamayE
shrIpati padamanucintaya h.rdayE

caraNam 7

janim.rti rOgarasAyana bhUtam
sanakamukhAkhila sanmuni gItam

caraNam 8

shrI rAmAcyuta shrI ramaNEti
nArAyaNa patmanAbha jayEti
